price: Mu by’ukuri abatoteje abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi (babakorera iyicarubozo), nyuma ntibicuze (kuri Allah), bazahanishwa ibihano by’umuriro wa Jahanamu, banahanishwe ibihano bitwika.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna fatanū al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti thumma lam yatūbū falahum ʿadhābu jahannama walahum ʿadhābu al-ḥarīqi
